flavorText: Her triumph came not from escaping her death, but in claiming her independence.

foreignData.flavorText: Ihr Triumph bestand nicht darin, dem Tode entronnen zu sein, sondern ihre Freiheit zurückgewonnen zu haben.
foreignData.name: Lilianas Triumph
foreignData.text: Jeder Gegner opfert eine Kreatur. Falls du einen Liliana-Planeswalker kontrollierst, wirft außerdem jeder Gegner eine Karte ab.

foreignData.flavorText: Su triunfo no consistió en escapar a su muerte, sino en alcanzar su independencia.
foreignData.name: Triunfo de Liliana
foreignData.text: Cada oponente sacrifica una criatura. Si controlas un planeswalker Liliana, cada oponente también descarta una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: Son triomphe ne fut pas de réussir à échapper à la mort, mais d'obtenir son indépendance.
foreignData.name: Triomphe de Liliana
foreignData.text: Chaque adversaire sacrifie une créature. Si vous contrôlez un planeswalker Liliana, chaque adversaire se défausse aussi d'une carte.

foreignData.flavorText: Il suo trionfo non fu sfuggire alla morte, ma reclamare la sua indipendenza.
foreignData.name: Trionfo di Liliana
foreignData.text: Ogni avversario sacrifica una creatura. Se controlli un planeswalker Liliana, ogni avversario scarta anche una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: 彼女の勝利は死の回避からではなく、独立の獲得から得られた。
foreignData.name: リリアナの勝利
foreignData.text: 各対戦相手はそれぞれクリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げる。あなたがリリアナ・プレインズウォーカーをコントロールしているなら、各対戦相手はさらにカード１枚を捨てる。

foreignData.flavorText: 그녀는 죽음에서 도망치는 것이 아니라, 자신의 독립을 주장하는 것으로 승리했다.
foreignData.name: 릴리아나의 승리
foreignData.text: 각 상대는 생물 한 개를 희생한다. 당신이 릴리아나 플레인즈워커를 조종한다면, 각 상대는 카드도 한 장 버린다.

foreignData.flavorText: Seu triunfo não foi escapar da morte, mas conquistar sua independência.
foreignData.name: Triunfo de Liliana
foreignData.text: Cada oponente sacrifica uma criatura. Se você controla uma planeswalker Liliana, cada oponente também descarta um card.

foreignData.flavorText: Ее триумф — не в побеге от смерти, но в том, что она обрела свою независимость.
foreignData.name: Триумф Лилианы
foreignData.text: Каждый оппонент жертвует существо. Если под вашим контролем есть planeswalker Лилиана, каждый оппонент также сбрасывает одну карту.

foreignData.flavorText: 她的胜利并非源自幸免死亡，而是源自重获自由。
foreignData.name: 莉莲娜得胜
foreignData.text: 每位对手各牺牲一个生物。如果你操控莉莲娜鹏洛客，则每位对手再各弃一张牌。

foreignData.flavorText: 她的勝利並非源自倖免死亡，而是源自重獲自由。
foreignData.name: 莉蓮娜得勝
foreignData.text: 每位對手各犧牲一個生物。如果你操控莉蓮娜鵬洛客，則每位對手再各棄一張牌。

name: Liliana's Triumph
originalText: Each opponent sacrifices a creature. If you control a Liliana planeswalker, each opponent also discards a card.

rulings.text: Whether you control an appropriate planeswalker is checked only as the spell resolves.
Controlling more than one planeswalker of the appropriate type won’t have any more of a benefit than just controlling one.

You can cast Liliana’s Triumph even if some or all of your opponents will be unable to sacrifice a creature. If you control a Liliana planeswalker, they’ll still discard a card, even if they couldn’t sacrifice a creature.

As Liliana’s Triumph resolves, the opponent whose turn it is (or, if it’s your turn, the next opponent in turn order) chooses a creature to sacrifice, then each other opponent in turn order does the same, knowing the choices made before them. Then all the chosen creatures are sacrificed at the same time. Then, if you control a Liliana planeswalker, in the same order, each opponent chooses a card in their hand without revealing it, and those cards are discarded at the same time.

text: Each opponent sacrifices a creature. If you control a Liliana planeswalker, each opponent also discards a card.
